body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Frank Barnes. May I kindly ask for your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great to meet you, Joan. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two three four, six seven eight nine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Joan. One more detail we need is your email address. Could you please share that with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is jhoward@emailprovider.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, thank you for the information. Is there any other way I can assist you today, Joan?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was looking into pricing for a new car and I'm feeling a bit sad about the high costs.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, pricing can sometimes be overwhelming. Let's see what we can do to help you. Thank you for sharing your concerns, Joan.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you again for your time today, Joan. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Frank. You've been very helpful. Have a great day too!
